category_description_kitchen: For an extra hand in th kitchen
category_description_tidying: For cleaning up and tidying the house
category_description_behaviour: For teaching good behavior and etiquette
category_description_web: For children who shall learn to surf smarter
category_description_garden: Performed out of the house and in the garden
group_description_cooking: 5 fun cooking tasks that can give a total reward of 19 kr per week
group_description_cleaning: 5 smart tasks that can give a total reward of 15 kr per week
group_description_pet: 3 good tasks that can give a reward of 9 kr per week
group_description_play: 7 inspiring tasks that can give a reward of 11 kr per week and 80 kr over time
group_description_school: 3 nice tasks that can give a total reward of 8 kr per week
group_description_web: 2 quite strict tasks that can give a total reward of 5 kr per week
group_description_strict: 5 tasks that can give a deduction of 17 kr per week but also a reward of 50 kr over time
template_description_clean_room: Put things away and clean up
template_description_set_table: Put out plates, cutlery, glasses and make it look nice
template_description_trash: Take out the garbage bags and throw the, away
template_description_profanity: Said swear words or used bad language
template_description_candy: Didn't eat any candy all week long
template_description_empty_dishwasher: Empty the dishwasher so that it can be filled with dirty dishes again
template_description_put_away_groceries: Help put away groceries and put them in the fridge
template_description_dinner_plan: Try to stick to the dinner plan
template_description_do_dishes: Scrub and rinse anything that is in the sink
template_description_table_manners: Sit properly, use knife and fork and don't play with food
template_description_gather_for_donation: Gather things that we can give away
template_description_loppis: Set up your own loppis where you sell things that aren't used anymore
template_title_selling_stand: Set up your own selling stand
template_description_selling_stand: Sell something to others on the street
template_description_pant: Collect bottles and boxes and recycle. You receive money for the recycling
template_description_gym_bag: Prepare your gym bag the day before you have gym class
template_description_skipped_class: Didn't go to class even though you should have
template_title_phone_at_dinner: Used phone at the dinner table
template_description_not_cleaned: If the room isn't cleaned once per week
template_description_fight: If you fight with your siblings, at school or with mom and dad
template_description_wash_car: Wash the car's outside and clean the inside
template_description_late_sleep: If you went to sleep later than agreed
template_description_make_bed: Lay the covers neatly and fluff the pillows
template_description_immigrants: Gather things that we can give away
template_description_help_pet: Take a walk of at least ten minutes
template_description_get_mail: Get the mail, and put it on the table
template_description_collect_wash: Samla smutstvätt och lägg det i tvättkorgen
